thread.title: New Appointment at the Ajman Palace Hotel in Dubai
thread.title_full: New Appointment at the Ajman Palace Hotel in Dubai

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: New Appointment at the Ajman Palace Hotel in Dubai
text:
New Appointment at the Ajman Palace Hotel in Dubai   
Oct 18, 2015 Ghazi Louhichi, The Ajman Palace Hotel Dubai eTN   
The Ajman Palace Hotel has appointed Ghazi Louhichi as its new food and beverage manager. Ghazi brings more than eight years' experience to his new role, having worked at prestigious properties such as Hilton London Metropole, Europe's largest conference and banqueting hotel, and Al Bustan Rotana Hotel Dubai, winner of Dubai Leading City Hotel 2013 at the World Travel Market. 
Commenting on Ghazi's appointment Ferghal Purcell, General Manager of The Ajman Palace Hotel said, "Ghazi will be a great asset to our team. We are confident with his strong F&B background, Ghazi will add tremendous value to our food and beverage offerings and will be instrumental in delivering a great dining experience to our guests". 
Prior to joining The Ajman Palace Hotel, Ghazi was assistant director of food and beverage at Al Bustan Rotana Hotel Dubai
